DOC.brief_summary: HYPOTHESES : The hypothesis : 1. nurse midwife able safely deliver interpersonal psychotherapy telephone woman postpartum depression 2. woman receive interpersonal psychotherapy less symptoms postpartum depression , good functioning , good bond baby , good relationship partner 3. woman postpartum depression satisfy care woman group refer mental health center .
DOC.detailed_description: The specific aim pilot non-randomized clinical trial evaluate among woman PPD recruit 6 24 week postpartum : 1 . The ( ) feasibility , ( b ) acceptability ( c ) safety psychological intervention ( Interpersonal Psychotherapy [ IPT ] ) provide nurse midwife collaboration mental health team ( psychiatrist team leader license social worker ) treatment PPD pilot two-armed non-randomized clinical trial . 2 . The preliminary evidence efficacy IPT decrease depressive symptom administer via telephone nurse-midwives/ woman 's health nurse practitioner 3 . The propose study also evaluate preliminary evidence efficacy IPT administer nurse midwife 1 . Improving general level maternal functioning 2 . Specific improvement marital adjustment 3 . Increase maternal infant bond This pilot study first step develop intervention decrease depressive symptom , improve functioning , improve interpersonal relationship mother spouse infant , improve access care , improve treatment engagement among postpartum woman diagnose PPD . The intervention cost-effective , brief acceptable patient nurse midwife incorporation current midwifery practice . If IPT program find feasible , acceptable safe preliminary evidence efficacy , postpartum IPT manual advance practice nurse finalize order test whether advanced practice nurse pediatric nurse practitioner family nurse practitioner also safely effectively administer IPT full-scale randomize clinical trial
DOC.criteria: 6 24 week postpartum 16 year old Englishspeaking Have access telephone Consents enter trial Postpartum onset postpartum depression Current use antidepressant medication long dose adjust subject 's healthcare provider clinical trial Infant complication require medical care beyond 6 week postpartum Infant birth defect Infant place adoption 6 week postpartum Maternal mental retardation Current use antidepressant medication require dosage adjustment subject 's healthcare provider clinical trial Diagnosis depression prior postpartum period Active substance alcohol abuse dependence Active suicidality , homicidality , current psychosis assess MINI Disabling pain interferes ability carry activity daily live Concurrent serious medical comorbidities ( e.g . active lupus , multiple sclerosis , severe cardiac disease severe hypertension , cancer , etc ) .
